title: Most Efficient Energy Use
description: In 2023, Ireland achieved a GDP of $50.79 per unit of energy use (PPP $ per kg of oil equivalent), the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Learning Poverty
description: In 2021, only 2.33% of children in Ireland were below minimum reading proficiency at the end of primary school, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Lowest Maternal Mortality
description: Ireland had a maternal mortality ratio of 1 per 100,000 live births in 2015, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Highest Computer and Communication Service Imports
description: In 2023, 86.45% of Ireland's commercial service imports were in computer, communications, and other services, the highest globally.

title: Lowest Manufacturing Growth
description: In 2023, Ireland's manufacturing sector shrank by 23.93%, the largest decline in the world.
